languages.text: "Завет Паутины есть знание, есть искусство, которое передается от одного поколения ткачей Кровавой паутины к другому. Не каждому культисту смерти хватает отведенного Неумирающим времени, чтобы полностью постичь его. Завет есть образ жизни и сам жизненный путь — от первого вдоха и до встречи с Неумирающим. Ему невозможно научить, ты долж{mf|ен|на} жить по Завету. Только тогда ты поймешь".

"The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."
languages.original_text: "Завет Паутины есть знание, есть искусство, которое передается от одного поколения ткачей Кровавой паутины к другому. Не каждому культисту смерти хватает отведенного Неумирающим времени, чтобы полностью постичь его. Завет есть образ жизни и сам жизненный путь — от первого вдоха и до встречи с Неумирающим. Ему невозможно научить, ты долж{mf|ен|на} жить по Завету. Только тогда ты поймешь".

traits.locale_text: "Ahn'shini is knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Not every weaver truly comprehends the Way in what time the Undying One gives them. Ahn'shini is how one walks their life's path, and it is the path itself, from their first sigh to the moment they meet the Undying One. Ahn'shini cannot be taught, it must be lived. Only then will you understand."

"Ahn'shini is knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Not every weaver truly comprehends the Way in what time the Undying One gives them. Ahn'shini is how one walks their life's path, and it is the path itself, from their first sigh to the moment they meet the Undying One. Ahn'shini cannot be taught, it must be lived. Only then will you understand."

languages.text: «La Doctrina es conocimiento, un arte que se transmite de generación en generación en la Red Sanguinolenta. Y, pese a ello, hay tejedores que nunca terminan de comprenderlo en el tiempo que les otorga el Inmortal. La Doctrina dicta cómo seguir los hilos de la vida, pero también es el propio hilo, del primer hálito hasta el último. La Doctrina no se puede enseñar. Hay que vivirla. Solo entonces podría comprenderla».
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."

traits.locale_text: «La Doctrina es conocimiento, un arte que se transmite de generación en generación en la Red Sanguinolenta. Y, pese a ello, hay tejedores que nunca terminan de comprenderlo en el tiempo que les otorga el Inmortal. La Doctrina dicta cómo seguir los hilos de la vida, pero también es el propio hilo, del primer hálito hasta el último. La Doctrina no se puede enseñar. Hay que vivirla. Solo entonces podría comprenderla».

languages.text: 「教義は知識であり、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの世代を超えて受け継がれる芸術でもある。それでも、不死の者から与えられた時間の中で、知識を完全に理解できない織り手もいる。教義は、人生の糸を歩むための方法であり、糸そのものでもある…最初の一息から最後の一息に至るまで。教義を教わることはできない。生きるしかない。そうすることで初めて理解することができる」
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."

traits.locale_text: 「教義は知識であり、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの世代を超えて受け継がれる芸術でもある。それでも、不死の者から与えられた時間の中で、知識を完全に理解できない織り手もいる。教義は、人生の糸を歩むための方法であり、糸そのものでもある…最初の一息から最後の一息に至るまで。教義を教わることはできない。生きるしかない。そうすることで初めて理解することができる」

languages.text: “织血罗网的教义是我们的知识，是我们世代相传的艺术，但即便如此，仍然有部分织网者无法在不死之神赐予他们的有限时间内完全理解这些知识。我们的教义不仅仅在于指引我们跟随丝线前进，它也同样是丝线本身，从第一次呼吸到最后一次呼吸。织血罗网的教义无法传授，只能亲身体会。只有这样，才能真正理解。”
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网的教义是我们的知识，是我们世代相传的艺术，但即便如此，仍然有部分织网者无法在不死之神赐予他们的有限时间内完全理解这些知识。我们的教义不仅仅在于指引我们跟随丝线前进，它也同样是丝线本身，从第一次呼吸到最后一次呼吸。织血罗网的教义无法传授，只能亲身体会。只有这样，才能真正理解。”

languages.text: "Die Grundsätze bergen Wissen, und die Kunst wird von einer Generation des Blutgesponnenen Netzes an die nächste weitergegeben. Trotzdem gibt es Spinner, die dieses Wissen in der Zeit, die ihnen der Todlose gewährt, niemals vollständig begreifen werden. Die Grundsätze legen fest, wie man dem Faden des Lebens folgt, aber sie sind auch selbst der Faden ... vom ersten bis zum letzten Atemzug. Die Grundsätze können nicht gelehrt werden. Man muss sie leben. Nur dann werdet Ihr verstehen."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."

traits.locale_text: "Die Grundätze bergen Wissen, und die Kunst wird von einer Generation des Blutgesponnenen Netzes an die nächste weitergegeben. Trotzdem gibt es Spinner, die dieses Wissen in der Zeit, die ihnen der Todlose gewährt, niemals vollständig begreifen werden. Die Grundsätze legen fest, wie man dem Faden des Lebens folgt, aber sie sind auch selbst der Faden ... vom ersten bis zum letzten Atemzug. Die Grundsäte können nicht gelehrt werden. Mann muss sie leben. Nur dann werdet Ihr verstehen."

languages.text: « Les Préceptes sont un trésor de connaissances, un art qui se transmet de génération en génération au sein de la Toile de Sang. Malgré tout, certains tisseurs ne comprendront jamais pleinement ces enseignements dans le délai qui leur est imparti par l'Immortel. Ils incarnent tout à la fois la manière dont on suit le fil de sa vie et le fil en lui-même, du premier souffle jusqu'au dernier. Les Préceptes ne s'apprennent pas, ils se vivent. Alors seulement, vous comprendrez. »
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."

languages.text: "İlkeler, irfan demektir. Kanipi Ağı'nın bir neslinden ötekine aktarılan bir sanattır. Buna rağmen Ölmeyen'e adadıkları ömürlerinde bu irfanı tamamen idrak edemeyen bazı dokurlar vardır. İlkeler, kişiye yaşamın ipliklerinin nasıl takip edileceğini öğretir ama bir yandan da ilk nefesimizden son nefesimize dek ipliğin ta kendisidir. İlkeler öğretilemez. İlkeler yaşanmalıdır. Ancak o zaman anlayabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets are knowledge, an art that is passed down from one generation of the Bloodspun Web to the next. Even so, there are spinners who will never fully comprehend this knowledge in the time allotted to them by the Undying One. The Tenets dictate how one follows the thread of life, but they are also the thread itself — from first breath to last. The Tenets cannot be taught. They must be lived. Only then will you understand."
